Both outputs address identical migration planning goals with same cost categories (BigQuery query costs $30-60/month storage costs API costs manual effort estimation). Average correctness score of 94. Both outputs maintain high syntactic quality with proper document structure formatting and mathematical accuracy. Minor variations in specific calculations but no major structural or formatting errors.
